tips: Best with overhead or side angles
Avoid shots with lots of sky

troubleshooting.flickering: Add: 'Maintain consistent exposure and brightness. Avoid any flickering or pulsing in lighting.'
troubleshooting.color_shift: Add: 'Lock the color temperature and white balance. Do not shift hues or saturation.'
troubleshooting.subject_drift: Add: 'Keep the main subject centered. Maintain consistent scale and position.'
troubleshooting.background_change: Add: 'Keep background elements static and unchanged. No new objects entering frame.'
troubleshooting.motion_jerk: Add: 'Maintain smooth, continuous motion. Avoid acceleration or deceleration changes.'
